thread.title: Harry Styles celebrates boozy 23rd birthday in style with 'tequila and karaoke' at star-studded Malibu party
thread.title_full: Harry Styles celebrates boozy 23rd birthday in style with 'tequila and karaoke' at star-studded Malibu party

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Harry Styles celebrates boozy 23rd birthday in style with 'tequila and karaoke' at star-studded Malibu party
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Harry Styles was celebrating in style this week with a star-studded party in Malibu as he marked his 23rd birthday. 
The former One Direction singer partied with the likes of Tommy Lee, Cindy Crawford, Rande Gerber, Cuba Gooding Jr. and Adele at the Cafe Habana in Los Angeles, California on Wednesday night. 
The star looked to be having a great time as he chatted to pals at the exclusive bash, laughing and joking as he did tequila shots, reports the MailOnline. Harry Styles celebrated his 23rd birthday this week (Photo: FameFlynet) He was spotted chatting with a mystery blonde pal (Photo: FameFlynet) He was seen relaxing at the star-studded bash (Photo: FameFlynet) 
It's also said Harry - who was spotted in a floral shirt with his hair pushed back by a pair of shades on top of his head - ended the night with some karaoke. 
He was spotted happily chatting to a mystery blonde at the party, as he took the chance to celebrate with pals. Raising a glass (Photo: FameFlynet) Harry seemed to be in great spirits (Photo: FameFlynet) Happy birthday Harry (Photo: FameFlynet) 
A source said: "Harry seemed to be having a great time with a small group of friends. 
“They were doing tequila shots and taking turns on the karaoke all night long.” 
Harry can look forward to an exciting 2017, with the star set to make his dramatic debut in epic World War II movie Dunkirk, and in the trailer unveiled just before Christmas he certainly doesn't look set to disappoint .
